name: Retro Spice Canisters Tea Towel Limited Edition
description:
Hand screen printed tea towel featuring Yardage Design's multi-coloured design, inspired by vintage "Gayware" spice canisters. This is a limited edition print of this design in pastel colours.

Hang it over the oven rail, or frame it for your kitchen wall.

This tea towel has been hand screen printed in Brisbane using eco friendly water based inks. Each tea towel is made from 100% linen, which is off-white in colour. This natural fabric is absorbent, very strong, and naturally antibacterial. The size of the tea towel is approximately 50cm x 70cm.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Wash separately before first use. Do not tumble dry. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: Girt by Sea Tea Towel
description:
A quintessentially Australian tea towel, with vintage style :: perfect for gifting to any Aussie either at home or overseas, or a lovely souvenir. Hang it over the oven rail, or frame it for your kitchen wall!

This tea towel was designed and handprinted by Yardage Design in Brisbane, Australia. The design is a two-colour print of ocean blue and a darker royal blue. This tea towel has been hand printed using eco friendly, water based inks.

Each tea towel is made from 100% linen. This natural fabric is absorbent, very strong, and naturally antibacterial.

The size of the tea towel is approximately 50cm x 70cm.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Wash separately before first use. Do not tumble dry. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: Make Something Pennant {now available in custom colours}
description:
An encouraging pennant to hang in your creative space/office/home designed and handprinted by Yardage Design. A two colour print, this pennant is shown in cherry red with accents of ocean blue. 

Want this pennant to match perfectly with your creative space? 
This pennant is also available in custom colour combinations. Simply select "custom colour" from the dropdown menu when ordering, and then specify your two colours (main colour and accent colour) in notes to seller at checkout (or just email them to nic@yardagedesign.com.au). Pick you colours from a Pantone fan (if you have one), a paint chart or simply describe it as best you can :: we'll do our best to match your colours!
Please allow up to 10 working days for your pennant to be printed.

This design is printed on a light cream/off-white coloured, medium weight organic cotton/hemp blend, and comes ready to hang on a sustainable bamboo knitting needle. Handprinted with water-based inks.

The pennant is 33cm wide (including the knitting needle) and approximately 33cm long. The hanging string is adjustable.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: Freckle Tea Towel {assorted colours}
description:
Inspired by one of my favourite treats, chocolate freckles, this tea towel features lots of pretty spots in a circle shape. This design is printed in neon pink and slate grey on an off-white linen tea towel. Other colourways of this design are also available from time to time ~ the drop down menu will show available options.

Hang it over the oven rail, or frame it for your kitchen wall!

This tea towel has been hand printed using eco friendly, water based inks.

Each tea towel is made from 100% linen. This natural fabric is absorbent, very strong, and naturally antibacterial.

The size of the tea towel is approximately 50cm x 70cm.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Wash separately before first use. Do not tumble dry. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

options.name: Neon pink/slate grey on off white
Neon orange/royal blue on off white
Duck egg blue on off white

name: "Fan" handprinted quilting fabric {assorted colours}
description:
Hand screen printed fabric featuring Yardage Design's "Fan" motif in assorted colours.

This design is printed on white quilting weight, 100% cotton Kona fabric.

Each unit purchased is a large fat quarter measuring 50cm x 70cm. Each unit is printed as a single fat quarter, so multiple units ordered will be individual fat quarters. 

This fabric is hand printed using eco friendly, water based inks. This fabric is suitable for quilting, craft and dressmaking projects. Each fan motif measures approximately 3cm wide and 2cm tall.

To buy more than one unit, adjust the Quantity at checkout.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Do not tumble dry. Do not dryclean. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: 'Stash Market Bag
description:
Need somewhere to stash your fabric or anything else for that matter? This sturdy market bag features patterned 'stashes by Yardage Design. This design has been hand screen printed in Brisbane, using eco friendly water based ink.

Each bag is made from strong, medium weight cotton canvas and has a gusset for better stability and greater capacity.

Dimensions - handles 4cm x 60cm long - comfortable to fit on your shoulder. Bag size 40cm high, 38 cm wide and 10cm gusset.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Do not tumble dry. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: ::  ::  LIMITED EDITION  ::  ::  Criss Cross Tea Towel
description:
"Criss Cross" is a diamond and cross design which has been handprinted using multiple colours at the one time, creating a spectrum of colours. Each limited edition tea towel is slightly different and completely original as a result of the printing technique.

Hang it over the oven rail, or frame it for your kitchen wall!

This tea towel has been hand printed using eco friendly, water based inks.

Each tea towel is made from 100% off white linen. This natural fabric is absorbent, very strong, and naturally antibacterial.

The size of the tea towel is approximately 50cm x 70cm.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Wash separately before first use. Do not tumble dry. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: Retro Flower Hand Bag
description:
A cute and useful hand bag, featuring an original retro flower motif by Yardage Design.

This sturdy bag has been hand screen printed in Brisbane, using tomato red eco friendly water based ink.

Each bag is made from heavy weight, unbleached cotton canvas, and has a gusset for better stability and greater capacity.

Dimensions - handles 2 x 26cm long - comfortable to fit on your shoulder. Bag size 22cm high, 33 cm wide and 10cm gusset.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Do not tumble dry. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: Sevilla Tea Towel
description:
"Sevilla" is a motif inspired by my love of the beautiful tiles and design found in Seville, Spain. This design is handprinted in cherry red or ocean blue on an off-white linen tea towel.

Hang it over the oven rail, or frame it for your kitchen wall!

This design is also available has handprinted fabric, and is available in this online store.

This tea towel has been hand printed using eco friendly, water based inks.

Each tea towel is made from 100% linen. This natural fabric is absorbent, very strong, and naturally antibacterial.

The size of the tea towel is approximately 50cm x 70cm.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Wash separately before first use. Do not tumble dry. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: "Fan" handprinted fabric {red}

Hand screen printed fabric featuring Yardage Design's "Fan" motif in cherry red.

This design is available in a choice of two fabrics: 
1. a natural/unbleached coloured, medium weight linen/cotton blend, 
2. a light cream/off-white coloured, medium weight organic cotton/hemp blend

These fabrics are also available to buy in this online shop as base cloth. 

Each unit purchased is a large fat quarter measuring 50cm x 70cm. Each unit is printed as a single fat quarter, so multiple units ordered will be individual fat quarters. Continuous yardage is available on request ~ please email nic@yardagedesign.com.au before placing your order.

This fabric is hand printed using eco friendly water based inks. This fabric is suitable for craft and dressmaking projects. Each fan motif measures approximately 3cm wide and 2cm tall.

name: Handprinted Fabric Charm Pack
description:
Perfect for patchwork, quilting and small projects, each charm pack contains 42 x 5 inch (12.7 cm) pre-cut squares of assorted Yardage Design handprinted fabrics.

Each pack includes a range of designs and fabric types (linen/cotton, hemp/organic cotton, cotton) in a broad colour scheme of blues and naturals, with a pop of red. 

The fabric in each pack is hand printed using eco friendly water based inks. This fabric is suitable for craft and dressmaking projects. 

To buy more than one unit, adjust the Quantity at checkout.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Do not tumble dry. Do not dryclean. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: Windows Market Bag
description:
The perfect market bag, featuring a detailed pattern inspired by beautiful leadlight window glass, printed in a range of colours. This sturdy bag has been hand screen printed in Brisbane, using eco friendly water based ink.

Each bag is made from strong, medium weight, unbleached hemp (55%) and cotton (45%), and has a gusset for better stability and greater capacity.

Dimensions - handles 2cm x 60cm long - comfortable to fit on your shoulder. Bag size 40cm high, 35 cm wide and 10cm gusset.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Do not tumble dry. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

name: Natural Wooden Bangle
description:
These wooden bangles are a blank canvas for your creativity :: cover them in fabric, decoupage, washi tape, paint them, draw on them, or simply enjoy as they are.

The internal diameter of each bangle is approximately 63mm (give or take 1mm as they are all unique); the external diameter is approximately 75mm; and they are 25mm wide.

To buy more than one bangle, adjust the Quantity at checkout.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: Make Your Own Bunting Craft Panels
description:
A bit of fun for crafters of all skill levels! Make your own bunting flags using this craft panel that is hand printed with 10 bunting flags and instructions (including sew and no-sew options). 

Perfect for kids rooms, parties or decoration - bunting can be used and reused for years.

Ten flags attached to bias binding/ribbon (not supplied) will make approximately 2 metres of bunting. The printed area of each craft panel is approximately 48cm x 68cm. Each flag is approximately 18cm wide at the top, and 23cm long.

Hand printed on lightweight cotton (100%). Available in the following colours that mix and match:
- Fire Engine Red (10 flags)
- Orange and Grey (5 flags in each colour)
- Navy Blue and Green (5 flags in each colour)

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Do not tumble dry. Do not dryclean. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: Verano "Petals" handprinted yardage fabric ~ ink blue
description:
Verano means "summertime" in Spanish. This fabric range is inspired by time spent in Spain during the European summer ~ the colours, sights and sounds of this historic and vibrant country. 

Hand screen printed fabric featuring Yardage Design's "Petals" motif from the Verano range in ink blue. 

The fabric is a light cream/off-white coloured, medium weight linen/cotton blend fabric, hand printed in Melbourne using eco friendly water based inks. This fabric is suitable for craft and dressmaking projects. Each motif measures approximately 12cm wide and 12cm tall.

The fabric is available as meterage at approximately 140cm wide.

Each unit purchased is equal to 25cm in length. However, if you purchase a single quantity it will be cut to the more practical size of 50cm x 70cm.

Multiple units will be cut as follows: 
2 units - 50cm x 140cm 
3 units - 75cm x 140cm 
4 units - 100cm x 140cm

To buy more than one unit, adjust the Quantity at checkout.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Do not tumble dry. Do not dryclean. Line dry in shade. Iron on reverse of print.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

name: PLAIN Basecloth Fabric ~ Organic Cotton/Hemp
description:
At last! Plain basecloth fabrics to coordinate with your favourite Yardage Design handprinted fabric.

The ever popular organic cotton/hemp is a medium weight (288gsm), light cream coloured fabric made of 45% organic cotton and 55% hemp. Perfect for dressmaking, quilting, crafting and soft furnishings.

Each unit purchased is half a metre (50cm x 140cm). For 1 metre, you will need to purchase two units.

Multiple units will be cut as one continuous piece of fabric as follows:
2 units - 100cm x 140cm
3 units - 150cm x 140cm
4 units - 200cm x 140cm

To buy more than one unit, adjust the Quantity at checkout.

Cold gentle machine wash (or handwash) with mild detergent. Do not tumble dry. Do not dryclean. Line dry in shade.

Prices in Australian dollars. We ship locally and internationally.

Each unit purchased is half a metre (50cm x 140cm). For 1 metre, you will need to purchase two units.

The fabric is available as meterage at approximately 140cm wide.
